Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Ultra Magnus sat down. His eyes showed ware in them. "A bot named blackheart 
has waged war against the maximals on cybertron. He found Optimus's body. I 
was on a mission to take it back, but I failed and had to flee. I think hes 
going to reprogram him, his spark will be replaced by a dark one or I fear 
much worse that like Starscrem prime's spark cna never be extinquished...and 
he might just corrupt it. Either way I fear our chances of winning the battle 
are slim. If he follows me here....it may bring the darkest of pits down on 
us......with Prime dealing the death blow."

--part1_14e.15f9c895.2adf4ce2_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
